amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title XIV which requires State approval of Federal fishing regulations in waters under the jurisdiction of the National Park Service and the Office of National Marine Sanctuaries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 8 printed in House Report 114-429 to strike language that requires state approval of federal fishing regulations in waters under the jurisdiction of the National Park Service and the Office of National Marine Sanctuaries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 236 (Roll no. 94).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Beyer.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 236 (Roll no. 94).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
